venue.address_1: Between Church, Elm, Temple and Chapel streets
venue.name: Lower New Haven Green

item.description:
Summer is here and that means New Haven is again hosting the International Arts & Ideas Festival. The two-week festival starts on Saturday with a free concert on the green featuring Buckwheat Zydeco and the Slavic Soul Party. See details of the event here

Bring a chair/blanket, bring some beer/wine, bring your ability to enjoy free music while sitting outdoors with friends.

I'll be heading to the green around 6:15 to stake out a place for my blanket and start enjoying my crackers with cheese and wine.

I plan on sitting in front of the fountain close to the stage, but I can't say for sure where I'll be exactly, so if you can't find me give me a call.

Contact: Jeanie (860) 942-4708
item.name: Free Concert on the Green - Buckwheat Zydeco
